channel.title: 508 godsword problem
channel.description: [b]Hello guys meybe anyone can help me i got this source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403571.0.html I got problem whit items like player need 75 attack to vield godsword...he got 75 he can wield it but if he train it to 76 he can't vield it anymore and it says u must hawe 75 attack to wield this item meybe someone can tell me what i can doo this &&&& happens whit alot of items :([/b]
